ai-patthana19.1:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
ai-patthana19.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana19.1:2.1_0: The Teaching doesn’t give rise to the unskillful.
ai-patthana19.1:2.1_2: Two on the aggregates of the aggregates, for the reasons.
ai-patthana19.1:2.1_3: Because of the result of past deeds, the basis of psychic power, and the three aggregates. ...
ai-patthana19.1:2.1_4: Unskillful thoughts arise from the unskillful and three conditions for the causes.
ai-patthana19.1:3.1_0: So skilled in the teaching of the skillful gives rise to causes.
ai-patthana19.1:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana19.1:3.1_2: Undeclared the three unskillful qualities arise and the causes.
ai-patthana19.1:4.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the undeclared points.
ai-patthana19.1:4.1_1: Noble thought gives rise to skillful qualities.
ai-patthana19.1:4.1_2: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
ai-patthana19.1:4.1_3: Noble One has no declared cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana19.1:4.1_4: There are no declared cause or condition for the five things.
ai-patthana19.1:5.1_0: One who is not skilled in the unskillful and skilled in the a cause of bad principles.

ai-patthana19.1:5.1_2: nor are they causes and conditions for the unskillful.

ai-patthana19.1:6.1_1: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the unskillful and blameless.
ai-patthana19.1:6.1_2: (These three unskillful qualities are not unskillful, and three causes and conditions for the causes.’)

ai-patthana19.1:8.1_0: skilled in the teaching, skilled in the supports, and skilled in the supports.
ai-patthana19.1:8.1_1: Mind is not the arising of teaching. The support is a condition for two reasons.
ai-patthana19.1:9.1_0: So the skilled in the unskillful is not the basis for the skillful.
ai-patthana19.1:9.1_1: So the support is not skilled in what is to be known. And what hasn’t been declared by the Realized One.
ai-patthana19.1:10.1_0: Noble thought gives rise to a skillful quality.
ai-patthana19.1:10.1_1: not declared: ‘This is a condition for the support.’
ai-patthana19.1:11.1_0: nor is a skilled in what is not unskillful, nor what is a basis for ending the defilements.

ai-patthana19.1:13.1_0: No skilled in the unskillful and the supports that arise because of the noble ones.

ai-patthana19.1:15.1_0: Not skilled in the teaching, skilled in visible.
ai-patthana19.1:15.1_1: There is no way of saying that the unskillful gives rise to confidence.
ai-patthana19.1:15.1_2: No by nature and unskillful phenomena don’t give rise to a principle.
ai-patthana19.1:16.1_0: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the unskillful. The support is not a condition for the arising of thought.
ai-patthana19.1:16.1_1: No skilled in the unskilled in the Truth, and the supports by the unskillful.
ai-patthana19.1:17.1_1: growing on the hair of the water,
ai-patthana19.1:17.1_2: He should not spent the new actions.

ai-patthana19.1:21.1_0: You don’t understand the teaching of the skillful.

ai-patthana19.1:41.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power have been determined on to having foster these sixteen years of seniority. ...
ai-patthana19.1:41.1_1: Hair in the eighteen years, twenty, thirty-six, and ninety years, while the eighteen bases of psychic power are born. ...
